title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.31 - Parking or stopping in certain areas prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.31 - Parking or stopping in certain areas prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall park or stop a vehicle in or upon the
airport: (a) In front of a
driveway. (b) Within a bus stop
zone or taxicab zone, except vehicles authorized to use such areas. (c) In other than leased or authorized areas
for the purpose of washing, greasing or repairing a vehicle, except those
repairs necessitated by an emergency. (d) On the roadway side of any stopped or
parked vehicle (double parking). (e) Within 15 feet of a fire
hydrant. (f) Other than in
accordance with the restrictions posted on authorized signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
